title: Mob War (1989 Mafia Movie) There's only one way to even the score.

sources.title: Mob War (1989 Mafia Movie) There's only one way to even the score.
sources.description:
Forget what you've heard. Forget what you've read. Forget what you've seen. In New York, this is the way it really is.
When the NYPD crashes a major powdered-sugar deal, reporters corner John Falcone, a local mobster, for answers. To polish his tarnished reputation, Falcone hires Todd Barrett, keeping him loyal with a steady supply of nose candy. However, Falcone's brutal and unconventional tactics put him at odds with Don Ricci, the big boss, sparking the threat of a mob war. When Todd's wife is caught in the crossfire, will the spin doctor turn the tables on the kingpins?

Director: J. Christian Ingvordsen

Main cast:
David Henry Keller - John Falcone
Johnny Stumper - Todd Barrett
Jake LaMotta - Don Ricci
John Weiner - Hector
Danny Kuchuck - Juan Pendejo
Steven Kaman - Martin Spostein
Adrianna Maxwell - Whitney Barrett
Dan Lutsky - Vince Petracco
Angel Caban - Felix
Monica Helm - Janice
Nick Gomez - Sal
Neave Benton - Tommy Bradford

Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller
Release date: October 11, 1989 (USA)
Filming location: New York City, USA
